Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Add Product Swap Mode to Banner Generator

Implements a new generation mode that preserves the design from a
Banner Reference image while only swapping the product and optionally
the text (headline/subheadline).

Changes:
- Add productSwapMode state to BannerBuilderState
- Update assembledPrompt logic for Product Swap Mode
- Support imageUrl in addition to avatarId for reference images
- Handle "reference" and "product" types in gemini.ts
- Add Product Swap Mode toggle to Brand Assets Manager UI
- Add translations for EN and RO

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
